import axios from'axios';var url='https://vhs-api.herokuapp.com/posts';// API calls to database 
export var fetchPosts=function fetchPosts(){return axios.get(url);};export var createPost=function createPost(newPost){return axios.post(url,newPost);};export var updatePost=function updatePost(id,updatedPost){return axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id),updatedPost);};export var deletePost=function deletePost(id){return axios.delete("".concat(url,"/").concat(id));};
